2021.headline: DMEA 2021
2021.description: DMEA is Europe´s leading event for digital health and brings together IT companies, institutions and policymakers with potential customers, industry professionals and newcomers. DMEA showcases the entire medical supply chain, showing each stage of every process. This is an ideal opportunity to keep informed about current developments and products for digital healthcare, to establish contacts in this sector and to increase knowledge at the highest level.

2021.headline: MEDTECH FORUM 2021
2021.description: The MedTech Forum is the largest health and medical technology industry conferences in Europe and a key event since 2007. Join industry leaders, leading innovators and investors to discuss the future opportunities in the medical technology sector. The MedTech Forum 2021 will be organized on 20-22 April in Barcelona.

2021.headline: VITALIS 2021 – THE LEADING NORDIC EHEALTH EVENT
2021.description:
Digitalisation in healthcare and welfare continues to be a topical subject of the public debate today. Vitalis 2021 will be the most relevant meeting place to shed light on current issues, attracting decision-makers from the health and social welfare community to join the debate and browse the market for new solutions. Vitalis eHealth event 2021: hybrid conference and virtual exhibition

This year’s successful concepts for the Vitalis Conference is developed as a hybrid meeting.. The conference will be held 18–20 May 2021 at the Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre, with the number of in-person participants as permitted by the situation and restrictions at the time, with a focus on a safe event. The digital Programme will present over 300 seminars. The exhibition will be held virtually. The programme will be available for delegates until 31 December.

In Cooperation with Vitalis, Upgraded now offer a beneficial -25% discount.       N.B. Upgraded members only. (contact us for more info.)

Vitalis 2021 Seminar Programme The Programme will be updated continuously.

Welcome to be part of three days of knowledge building, networking and important discussions on the future of healthcare!

2021.headline: STARTUP YOUR HEALTHBIZ – MAY 2021
2021.description:
Welcome to Startup your Healthbiz, organised by City of Helsinki in cooperation with Upgraded – Health Startup Association of Finland, and Vertical! Startup Your Healthbiz is a 3-day Business Idea Booster aimed at university researchers in the Greater Helsinki Area, however, the Day 1 talks are open to all who are interested in learning about the healthcare business sector. 

During the series of talks hosted on Day 1, 25th of May, you will learn about running a startup within the Healthcare sector and how to take the next steps in starting your own Healthbiz venture.

The topics range from first-hand accounts from Healthtech founders, to practical advice on IP processes, succeeding at funding, and pitching. Each topic is presented by an expert in that field. Additional program content for on the discussed topics is available for registered teams on Day 2 and 3 of the 3-Day Booster.

2021.headline: PREPARING FOR INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS: THE POWER OF INSIGHT
2021.description:
Are you a health startup or a growth company with international ambitions? Are you wondering where to place your bets? This event is for you. Join us for an interactive workshop on Thursday, 17 June!

Health Capital Helsinki presents Cetas Healthcare, a global market intelligence agency, that offers affordable market research, customer insights and consulting to the medical device and diagnostics marketplace.

In a recent survey by Health Capital Helsinki and Upgraded, health startups and growth companies told us that they would appreciate support in sales and marketing. We see an unmet need for market analysis services and want to introduce you with one potential service provider.

2021.headline: *SHIP STARTUP FESTIVAL
2021.description:
*ship Startup Festival supports the next generation of entrepreneurs! It is a startup event that consists of a mentor program and the Pitch Captain pitching competition. Annually *ship brings together 50 startup teams to compete for the 5000€ main prize!

*ship will be organized completely online this year. Using the Deal Room -event platform our Mentoring Program and the Pitch Captain Competition will reach out all over the world. With a completely new online platform, participants can find everything in one place: set up meetings with *ship mentors and network virtually throughout the two-day event. The Pitch Captain Competition will be hosted live on the same platform on the 13th of August.

Application open until 19th of July, 2021.

2021.headline: TERVEYDEN ÄLYPUHELINSOVELLUS – TRENDIT, REGULAATIO JA ARVIOINTI
2021.description:
Health app – trends, regulatory affairs, and assessment frameworks

The training is in Finnish, the event is limited to 15 participants.

Price: 350 euros (+VAT 24 %)

Since the publication of the first mobile app store in 2008, the world has experienced a fast-growing market for wellness, health and medical apps. Concerns about the quality and reliability of apps has been present since the first steps in the wellness, health and medical apps era. Today, in most cases, the mobile app is the focal point within an ecosystem of devices. These apps are often promoted directly to consumers through app stores without going through any formal evaluation. Many countries and organizations have health apps assessment frameworks and app repositories that meet locally defined requirements. These activities are important for any app developer who want to promote or sell their product.

This training day covers the following three main themes:

-Status and trends of mHealth and health app market today

-Health app as a medical device – regulatory affairs and compliance (MDR 2017/745)

-Assessment frameworks and standards to support app development, recommendation and prescription activities.

2021.headline: HELSINKI BRAIN & MIND RESEARCH-INDUSTRY COLLABORATION EVENT
2021.description:
The Helsinki Brain & Mind Research-Industry Collaboration Event is organised jointly by the University of Helsinki, Aalto University and HUS Helsinki University Hospital.

The event will bring together researchers and companies in the capital region to learn about the different research activities and facilities, as well as industrial interests in the field of neuroimaging and cell and animal modeling in neuroscience.

The event will offer a great opportunity for networking and identifying shared interests and potential research collaboration topics with other participants.

You are most welcome to join this virtual event from wherever you like!

When: 9/9/2021 @ 12-18 (posters and virtual stands remain open also the following day)

Where: Online (Liveto’s virtual event platform)

For: Researchers, clinicians, companies, students and representatives from other organisations interested in neuroscience and research collaboration in the capital region. Participation is free for all participants.

Posters: We highly encourage researchers to present electronic posters during the event. The posters should be submitted as pdfs (in addition to the traditional poster format, posters can also be for example 1-4 A4 pages long documents or power point presentations saved as pdf). The deadline for submitting the posters is 6/8/2021.

Stands: Companies and other organisations are very welcome to present at virtual stands for free. Please contact verna.achte@helsinki.fi for more information. The deadline for submitting material to the stands is 6/8/2021.

Registration: Register for the event here by 21/6/2021.
